summary: Diff removes Instagram from default profile links and adds defensive filtering/cleanup to prevent Instagram links in profile.links from rendering, while introducing additional unrelated URL validation/toast behavior and Twitter/X filtering. The dedicated Instagram button behavior (single button, label, and new-tab navigation) is not fully verifiable from the truncated App.tsx diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the UI shows only one Instagram button/link and clicking it navigates to https://www.instagram.com/ae560919?igsh=NHFmdnppNzU4OWVy in a new tab, with no "Follow me on Instagram" button shown.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows Instagram URL constant and filtering of Instagram links from profile.links, but the actual dedicated Instagram button/link markup (including target="_blank" and ensuring exactly one visible Instagram-related button) is in truncated portions of App.tsx and is not directly evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the Instagram button label text to English that does not say “Follow me on Instagram” (e.g., "Instagram").
missing_requirements.reason: App.tsx content containing the Instagram button label is not shown in the provided truncated snippet; only a secondary summary text claims the label is "Instagram".

hallucinated_features.description: Filtering out Twitter/X links from profile.links rendering and from persisted profile data.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to address duplicate Instagram; it explicitly lists non-goal of adding additional social platforms/changes beyond the Instagram change requested.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (truncated) // Filter out Twitter/X and Instagram links

hallucinated_features.description: Click-time outbound URL validation with toast error messaging for invalid links.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; introduces new behavior beyond Instagram button deduplication/label updates.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions new isValidOutboundUrl helper and click-time validation)

hallucinated_features.description: New/expanded toast notification system usage for share copy and invalid links.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest focuses only on Instagram button/link duplication and label.
